qoute: Integrity without knowledge is weak and useless, and knowledge without integrity is dangerous and dreadful.
Live so that when your children think of fairness and integrity, they think of you.
Honesty and integrity are by far the most important assets of an entrepreneur.
Honor your commitments with integrity.
If you have integrity, nothing else matters. If you don't have integrity, nothing else matters.
In failing circumstances no one can be relied on to keep their integrity.
Integrity without knowledge is weak and useless, and knowledge without integrity is dangerous and dreadful.
Live so that when your children think of fairness and integrity, they think of you.
Honesty and integrity are by far the most important assets of an entrepreneur.
Honor your commitments with integrity.
If you have integrity, nothing else matters. If you don't have integrity, nothing else matters.
In failing circumstances no one can be relied on to keep their integrity.
Integrity has no need of rules.
Integrity is doing the right thing, even when no one is watching.
Integrity is praised and then left out in the cold.
Integrity is the essence of everything successful.
Integrity simple means not violating one's own identity.
Integrity without knowledge is weak and useless, and knowledge without integrity is dangerous and dreadful.
It is true that integrity alone won't make you a leader, but without integrity you will never be one.
Live with integrity, respect the rights of other people, and follow your own bliss.
Nothing is at last sacred but the integrity of your own mind.
Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobody's going to know whether you did it or not.
Subtlety may deceive you; integrity never will.
The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
The integrity of men is to be measured by their conduct, not by their professions.
The laboring man has not leisure for a true integrity day by day.
The most important persuasion tool you have in your entire arsenal is integrity.
The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.
There can be no friendship without confidence, and no confidence without integrity.
To be in this business and have tremendous integrity and only make distinguished choices is very tough.
You are in integrity when the life you are living on the outside matches who you are on the inside.
You must consider the bottom line, but make it integrity before profits.
A building has integrity just like a man. And just as seldom.
Some persons are likable in spite of their unswerving integrity.
